name: PickAndGive
overview:
At PickAndGive.org, our mission is to increase the ability of non-profits to enact positive change in their communities and enable donors to feel confident that their donation is directly making an impact in the lives of others.

Targeting Gen-Xers and Gen-Yers, PickAndGive aims to give users the freedom and ability to take control over their charitable donations. While we understand the importance for individuals to donate cash to non-profit organizations, we have also seen a great need for users to be able to control their donations more directly.

PickAndGive therefore allows charities to list specific items they need to fulfill their goals; users can then “pick” and “give” any of these items, knowing full well that their donations will be used for. It’s simple, secure and straightforward.
